text: Risk level 4 (Critical): Immediate danger. Slow down at once.
Risk level 3 (High): Increase following distance and reduce speed.
Risk level 2 (Moderate): Be vigilant, maintain lane discipline.
Risk level 1 (Low): Normal driving but stay cautious.
Stereo depth uses SGBM disparity; closer objects have higher disparity.
Speed is estimated from object track displacement across frames after calibration.
Driver distraction increases risk even at low speeds.
